attributes.action: Limit the number of Council Estates to 1 for each town.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Council estates were good places to live after the war but have now turned into breading grounds for all manner of things bad and are a great strain on the Police forces, so we need to limit these estates now to 1 for each town, maximum of 500 houses.
